title: Which Riven Skin is easiest to cancel with?
body:
This question is basically for Riven mains but anyone can answer. Please support with reasoning though.
I've heard Redeemed Riven has the smoothest animation cancel but some people say Battle Bunny is the equivalent to it.
I was wondering which one is smoother in your guy's opinions.

replies.body:
Hey WoGL Pro,

All of the Riven skins, including the base, utilize the same animation set, so cancelling any animation is the same. However, some skins, Arcade and Dragonblade, have different sound effects which may feel a bit off at first and may take a bit of getting used to.

it is

Welp, just like Riot KateyKhaos mentioned, all animations on skins and classics should be the same, or else Riot would disable them and polish them until they're ready. This is why PBE exists too, gives Riot time to get a closer look to glitches or bugs.

But aside from that, I only have Dragonblade so I don't know what to say :P plus I'm playing in ~280 ping so I don't bother on cancelling animations

I personally will use any. But I usually do better with Arcade, then Battle Bunny, then Redeemed, to Original.
But it might just be me choosing a nice skin making me play better.
I tend to use battle bunny more due to it being 1. an amazing skin, and 2. It has very clean animations plus no overwhelming particles ex. Arcade,Dragonblade.
